name: basic_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kubric_the_comprehensive_movie_news_api.
Tool description: Stay up-to-date with Kubric, your ultimate movie news API. Access top sources, search by title or keyword, and experience visually engaging cinema updates and insights.
API description: Performs a basic search for movie news articles using the `/news/basic/search` endpoint.

q.description: The query term for the search, typically a keyword related to movie news.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before returning results. Default is 0.
